additionalValues: Aye Cap'n this will go well in the stable.
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} III- Into the Meat and Potatoes
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} IV - Time is of the essence.

Actions.value: Good news Commander {Commander.LastName}, the MIM have made significant discoveries to enable us to better define our next move. Sending you the mission parameters.

additionalValues: {TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} IV - Bring your Guns to Town

Actions.value: Commander JumpShip emergance detected and a DropShip is in-bound. Estimate 5 days to Planet Fall.
We have re-evaluated the FOB output and will have enough units to assault the compound within those five days. Re-Up as much as possible and sorry for the short notice Commander.
Commander {Commander.LastName}, JumpShip emergance detected and a DropShip is in-bound. Estimate Five days to Planet Fall.
We need to set the ELF sensors before they arrive... You have two days to re-up as best as possible. Don't fail this one.
<Stats.Company.[TB_FailCount]> Commander {Commander.LastName}, Sorry Commander - we are going to have to let you go
Well done Commander. Although this is not the outcome we were ultimately hoping for. His sacrifice will be remembered.
Commander {Commander.LastName}, Sorry Commander - we are going to have to let you go
Amazing work Commander {Commander.LastName}. Are you sure you don't a permanent Position in the Magistracy Armed Forces?

additionalValues: Commander {Commander.LastName}, Sorry Commander - This is less than the stirling performance we were looking for.
Amazing work Commander {Commander.LastName}. New Abilene is safe - we now have cut out the rotten wood and replace it with strong new timbers.
